task.title: Derive Session
task.shortdesc: Derive a new session using records from existing sessions.

step.cmd: Choose the Project Derive Session... menu item.
step.stepresult: A Merge Sessions dialog will appear.

step.cmd: Enter a Session name and Destination Corpus in the provided fields. Select one or more of the sessions for the split or merge and click Next.
step.stepresult: The second page of the Merge Sessions dialog will appear.If you chose only one session, the selected records will be put into the new session. If you select more than one session, the selected records will be merged into a new session.

step.cmd: Select a session from the Session list at the left and choose whether to merge or split All records, a subset of Specific records, Records for participant(s) or Records from Search results. Repeat this process for all sessions in the Session list. Click Next.
step.stepresult: This will begin the merging of the selected records/sessions.If you choose to merge only specific records, you will have to specify the relevant record numbers. To specify several individual records, separate them with a comma and a space. To specify a range, separate the beginning and end record numbers with two periods and a space. If you choose to merge records for specific participants, you must select the participants from the list. If you choose to merge records from search results, you must select a past search from the list.

step.cmd: Once the Session Merger shutdown alert appears, click Close.
step.stepresult: The newly derived session will appear in the specified Corpus in the Project Manager.
